title: Roster overhaul, six pillars and the Pittsburgh Steelers: Inside the Kings' latest revamp
content: The Kings fired Mike Brown this time last season, but one year later don't seem any closer to finding their way.

title: Cubs land Cabrera, trade top prospect to Marlins
content: The Cubs have acquired pitcher Edward Cabrera in a trade with the Marlins that sends top outfield prospect Owen Caissie, as well as  infield prospects Cristian Hernandez and Edgardo De Leon, to Miami.

title: Jerry Jones: Goal is to retire with most SB wins
content: Cowboys owner Jerry Jones said Wednesday that his goal in life is to the retire as the owner with the most Super Bowl wins and that he has "work to do" to catch the Patriots' Robert Kraft.

title: Jim Harbaugh hails John, hopes he's NFC-bound
content: Jim Harbaugh doesn't expect his older brother John to be out of a job very long but just hopes his next landing spot isn't in the AFC, where the Chargers reside. "As I told him, whatever team he goes to is going to be formidable," Jim said.

title: Sources: Hawks' Young prefers trade to Wizards
content: Hawks star Trae Young has the Washington Wizards as his preferred destination as player and his current team work together on a possible trade, sources tell ESPN.

title: Mammoth to host '27 Winter Classic on Utes' field
content: The Mammoth will make their first appearance in an outdoor game in 2027, when they host the Avalanche in the Winter Classic at University of Utah's Rice-Eccles Stadium.

title: 3 arrested in connection with S. Sanders burglary
content: Three suspects have been arrested in connection with a burglary that took place at the home of Browns quarterback Shedeur Sanders in November. A fourth suspect remains at large.

title: Cristobal: 'Blame the adults' for portal trickery
content: Asked if he thought opponents would attempt to contact former players for inside information, Miami coach Mario Cristobal said, "It happens all the time." But he's not pointing the finger at any players who have left the program.

title: üèà Our latest NFL mock draft predicts Picks 1-32
content: Which QB fits with the Raiders at No. 1? How high could Jeremiyah Love go? Will the Buckeyes run the first round? Let's project the first 32 picks for April.

title: Connelly breaks down Miami-Ole Miss, Oregon-Indiana
content: Our deep dive into the semifinals dissects the matchups that will determine who moves on to the title game.

title: Facing the Texans this postseason? Broncos? Seahawks? Good luck! Solak on the three elite NFL defenses
content: This year's playoffs will feature three superior defenses: the Texans, Broncos and Seahawks. What makes each so unstoppable?

title: Wetzel: Welcome to a new college football world, where the SEC is no longer undisputed king
content: The Big Ten is guaranteed to be playing for a third straight national title. Can the SEC find a way to dominate this new era like it did the previous one?

title: Who are MLB's top young stars? Ranking baseball's best players at every age from 16 to 25
content: Julio Rodriguez or Bobby Witt Jr.? Roman Anthony or Jackson Chourio? We rank baseball's best by birth year.

title: Ty Simpson declares for the NFL draft: What does it mean for the QB class, Alabama's next moves?
content: Simpson announced he will enter the 2026 NFL draft. Is he a first-rounder? Which teams could be good fits? And who could replace him at Alabama?

title: Best way to an Eagles defensive lineman's heart -- and performance? Meatballs
content: Vic Fangio introduced the Meatball Award this season for his defense to serve as that extra bit of motivation.

title: Four trade proposals for Young: What could Atlanta get for the star guard?
content: Trae Young could become the NBA trade season's first domino. Let's help the Hawks find the best move for him.

title: Is parity in the Premier League a sign of quality -- or do these teams just stink?
content: The gap between 5th place and 14th in the Premier League standings is four points. Does that mean the league is full of good teams, or bad ones?

title: What Rosenior and Fletcher will bring to Chelsea, Man United
content: Chelsea's Liam Rosenior and Man United's Darren Fletcher will take their first steps on a touchline this week.

title: Amber Glenn is finally ready for her Olympic moment
content: This week, Amber Glenn looks to defend her back-to-back national titles -- and become the oldest U.S. Olympic women's singles skater in 98 years.

title: Bracketology: Gonzaga is doing Gonzaga things again
content: Outside of one blowout loss, the Zags are unbeaten -- and could stay that way until Selection Sunday.

title: Power Rankings: Who is really the top team in the Big 12?
content: Texas Tech, one of four unbeaten teams left in women's D-I, and Baylor enter the top 16 as UNC and Notre Dame exit.

title: Bracketology: Kentucky is biggest winner as upsets shake up top 16
content: The new year has brought some big upsets, a shake-up of the top 16 seeds and a new-look Bracketology.

title: Inside Raiders' lost 2025 season: Tom Brady's influence, private meetings and dysfunction
content: "Who would want the Raiders job?" The inside story of how the Raiders went from playoff hopes to the No. 1 pick and another fired coach.

title: The fastest, longest, most improbable NFL plays from this season
content: From the real speed of Jahmyr Gibbs to the relative speed of Aaron Rodgers, Next Gen Stats had the most thrilling plays of 2025.

title: Don't be surprised if ... Brock Purdy leads in passing TDs, Luther Burden III breaks out in 2026
content: With another fantasy season in the books, Eric Karabell makes some early bold predictions for the 2026 season.

title: How Trevor Lawrence's grill gift was kept a surprise -- and came together
content: The quarterback's grill came from a collaboration of his mom, wife, former Clemson teammate and the Jaguars social media team.

title: Peach Bowl concessions include brisket item honoring Oregon, Indiana
content: Fans who attend Friday's Peach Bowl can try Mercedes-Benz Stadium's new 2-foot dueling brisket sandwich.

title: Who will be Man United's next manager? 12 top candidates to replace Amorim
content: Whether Manchester United aim to hire quickly or wait until summer, here are the coaches they could be after.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Arsenal eye AFCON star Yan Diomande in over $100M deal
content: Arsenal are chasing the Premier League title, but it's not stopping them from exploring a summer deal for RB Leipzig winger Yan Diomande. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: MLB offseason intel: Trade rumors and free agency updates
content: Here's what we're hearing about Ketel Marte, Alex Bregman, Bo Bichette and much more as the hot stove heats back up.

title: Ranking the top American tennis players as 2026 begins
content: Coco Gauff won another major title in 2025, and Taylor Fritz continued to lead the American men. But who else is set to make a move in 2026?

title: What if Putin imitates Trump and tries a 'Maduro' on Zelenskyy?
content: US forces' capture of Venezuela's President Maduro, framed as law enforcement, has altered global perceptions of state actions. This precedent raises concerns about potential similar moves against leaders like Ukraine's Zelenskyy. However, Ukraine's unique wartime context, strong Western backing, and national unity make such an operation highly improbable for Russia.

title: ‚ÄòDream Military‚Äô: Trump proposes $1.5 trillion defence outlay for 2027, up from $1 trillion
content: President Donald Trump has proposed a $1.5 trillion military budget for 2027, an increase from the previously discussed $1 trillion. He stated this expanded allocation is crucial for building a "Dream Military" to ensure national security amidst global instability. Trump also linked this increased defense spending to revenues generated from tariffs.

title: 'No state has right ...': Russia furious over US seizing oil tanker; cites maritime law
content: US forces seized a Russian-flagged oil tanker, the Marinera, in the North Atlantic, citing violations of US sanctions. Russia vehemently condemned the action, asserting it lacked legal basis and violated freedom of navigation on the high seas. The tanker, previously sanctioned and renamed, had reportedly evaded a US blockade near Venezuela.

title: April 1-Sept 30: Govt notifies timeline for phase 1 Census; first-ever digital exercise
content: The Union home ministry has notified the timeline for the first phase of Census 2027, focusing on housing and houselisting operations. This phase will be conducted over 30 days between April 1 and September 30 this year, with an option for 15-day self-enumeration before the main operation.

title: Google cofounder Larry Page leaves Silicon Valley: Moves assets to Delaware - here's why
content: Google cofounder Larry Page has shifted key business entities, including his family office, out of California to Delaware, Nevada, and Florida. This move precedes a potential state wealth tax, which could cost him billions. Other tech titans are also exploring exits, citing tax and privacy advantages offered by states like Delaware.

title: 'We will take all the oil': US reveals plan for Venezuela; what are the 3 phases?
content: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio outlined a three-phase plan for Venezuela post-Maduro, asserting that Washington is planning "to execute a deal to take all the oil" that is stuck in the country with proceeds benefiting the Venezuelan people. Rubio also confirmed upcoming meetings with Danish officials regarding the US interest in acquiring Greenland.

title: Breaking law will lead to deportation, US warns students against visa violations
content: The US embassy in India has warned student visa holders that violating laws can lead to visa revocation, deportation, and permanent ineligibility for future US visas. This follows a similar warning for H1B and H4 visa applicants. Recent changes also mandate in-person interviews for most non-immigrant visa applicants.

title: Apple execs won't leave South Korea: Hunting Samsung, SK Hynix supply; iPhone RAM at risk
content: Apple executives are stationed in South Korea, seeking long-term memory chip contracts amid a severe global shortage.  RAM prices have surged dramatically, forcing tech giants like Dell, Google, and Amazon to also establish extended stays.  This "semiconductor boom" is driven by AI demand, impacting smartphone production costs and potentially leading to higher iPhone prices or reduced RAM.

title: EC officials deliver SIR notice to Amartya home in Santiniketan
content: Nobel laureate Amartya Sen received an election notice alleging an age difference of less than 15 years with his late mother, a claim his representatives call harassment. The Election Commission stated the discrepancy was flagged by a portal, and officials visited Sen's residence to resolve it, despite the actual age gap being over 19 years.

title: Musk says he's impressed with China; highlights its rapid EV & solar growth
content: Elon Musk humorously noted China's rapid adoption of his energy suggestions, including massive battery, EV, and solar production. He emphasized batteries as key to increasing energy output, citing Tesla's Megapacks and the new Megablock as solutions for grid stability and AI-driven power demands.

title: Giannis Antetokounmpo‚Äôs wife opens up on losing identity after motherhood
content: Mariah Riddlesprigger, wife of NBA star Giannis Antetokounmpo, candidly shared the challenges of motherhood and losing her identity during COVID-19. She also addressed the couple's decision to shield their four children from the media spotlight, emphasizing privacy concerns. Despite these struggles, Mariah has launched a clothing brand and leads a foundation.

title: Govt considers raising EPFO monthly wage cap to Rs 25k-30k
content: A proposal to raise the Employees Provident Fund Organisation's monthly wage ceiling beyond Rs 15,000 is back on the table, with suggestions for an increase to Rs 25,000-30,000. This move aims to bring more low-wage and minimum-wage earners, especially in the unorganised sector, under the social security net.

title: Madras high court bans book with 'scandalous' remarks against Deepam judge
content: Madras HC has prohibited the publication, sale, and circulation of a Tamil book containing derogatory remarks against Justice G R Swaminathan. The court initiated suo motu contempt proceedings against the publisher, Keezhaikaatru Publishers, for content deemed highly abusive and scandalous.

title: Travis Kelce reaches breaking point as Taylor Swift hits new career
content: As the Chiefs wrapped up a disappointing season, Travis Kelce faced mounting questions about his NFL future and the possibility of retirement. At the same time, Taylor Swift reached another career high, extending her historic run atop the Billboard 200. The contrast highlighted a pivotal moment for the high-profile couple, with one career pausing as the other surged forward.

title: Tommy Fleetwood and Clare Fleetwood‚Äôs net worth: Golf earnings, family, fortune
content: Tommy and Clare Fleetwood have built a significant fortune through Tommy's successful golf career, prize money, and lucrative brand deals. Clare, as his manager, plays a crucial role in their financial success and their private family life. Their collaborative approach has led to both on-course achievements and long-term financial stability.

title: Rangers trade buzz grows as Artemi Panarin rumors heat up
content: The New York Rangers are preparing for major roster changes. General Manager Chris Drury is exploring trade options for star player Artemi Panarin and other forwards. The team aims to improve results quickly. Drury may act before the March trade deadline. This move is intended to send a strong message to the team.

title: J&K: Gunfight erupts in Kathua after sighting of terror suspects
content: Security forces engaged terrorists in a fierce gun battle in Kathua's Billawar forests on Wednesday.  Following a tip-off about suspicious movement, a joint operation led to a firefight with a group of two to three ultras. The encounter continued despite challenging conditions, with the area cordoned off. This incident is part of ongoing counter-terror operations across the region.

title: Riley Gaines reacts as Trump‚Äôs transgender weightlifter video goes viral
content: ‚ÄãA viral video of Donald Trump acting out a transgender weightlifting scene sparked strong reactions online. Riley Gaines praised the clip and said she fully supports Trump. During the same event, Trump revealed that Melania Trump dislikes some of his public gestures, including dancing. Reports from USA Today and NBC News confirmed details from the meeting.

title: 1st 2026 space mission: DRDO defence Sat to ride PSLV-C62; refuelling tech, Nepal Sat onboard
content: India's first space mission of 2026, PSLV-C62, is set to launch on January 12, carrying DRDO's advanced defense satellite Anvesha (EOS-N1) for enhanced surveillance. The mission will also test on-orbit refuelling technology with OrbitAID's AyulSAT and deploy Nepal's Earth observation satellite Munal, alongside 13 other satellites from India and international partners.

title: US warplanes and elite units have been landing in Britain since the weekend
content: Heavily armed US military aircraft, including cargo jets and gunships, have landed in Britain following the reported capture of Venezuela's President Maduro. The deployment suggests preparations for further operations, with exercises involving special operations soldiers observed. The UK government has declined to comment on the activity.

title: Unable to move, hippo stuck in Kolkata zoo pool for 2 weeks
content: A young hippopotamus at Alipore Zoo has been unable to move for two weeks, likely due to a neurological disease or leg injury. A medical team is monitoring the animal, which has shown some signs of improvement and is slowly responding to treatment. The zoo is seeking expert advice for a definitive diagnosis and treatment plan.

title: Mastiii 4 faces legal scrutiny as Delhi HC issues notice to producers
content: Mastiii 4 has come under legal scrutiny after popular content creator Ashish Sharma approached the Delhi High Court, flagging similarities between a comedy sequence in the film and his viral Instagram reel that clocked over 11 million views.

title: Explained: Will Trump's play for Greenland break Nato?
content: Secretary of State Marco Rubio announced a meeting with Denmark next week amid concerns over a potential US annexation of Greenland. Danish Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen warned such a move would end Nato, while Donald Trump's past skepticism and recent statements on alliance commitments add to the uncertainty.

title: Greenland grab begins? Rubio to visit Denmark; high-stake meet on cards
content: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio announced a meeting with Denmark next week, following European leaders' strong rejection of President Trump's Greenland takeover idea.  European nations, including France and Germany, emphasized Greenland's self-governance and its importance for Arctic security within NATO.  The island's strategic location and mineral wealth are key factors in renewed US interest.

title: Nuggets vs Celtics: Injury report, who‚Äôs out, where to watch
content: A highly anticipated NBA clash between the Denver Nuggets and Boston Celtics on January 7, 2026, is significantly altered by key absences. With Nikola Jokic and Jayson Tatum sidelined, the game shifts from a star-studded affair to a test of team depth and execution. Both teams face additional injury concerns, making rotations and player matchups crucial for victory.

title: From Atlantic to Caribbean: US seizes 2 Venezuela-linked oil tankers; 'blockade' in full effect
content: American forces seized a Russian-flagged oil tanker linked to Venezuela after a lengthy pursuit. The vessel, previously sanctioned for smuggling for Hezbollah, attempted to evade a US blockade. Despite claims of Russian protection, the US considers the ship stateless, marking the second such seizure by American forces in the Caribbean.

title: Gulshan Devaiah quits Yash‚Äôs ‚ÄòToxic‚Äô midway, cites non-payment issues
content: Gulshan Devaiah has opened up about his decision to quit the much-anticipated Yash-starrer Toxic: A Fairy Tale for Grown-Ups. In a recent interview, the actor revealed that he walked out of the project midway due to multiple reasons, including payment issues and alleged mistreatment of his manager.

title: David Raya & Tatiana Trouboul net worth: Salary, bonuses, sponsorships
content: Renowned Premier League goalkeeper David Raya, now among football's highest earners, commands an estimated ¬£120,000 weekly from Arsenal. His substantial net worth, valued at approximately ¬£15 million, is further bolstered by endorsements from brands like Adidas and Rosa Blanca. His wife, Tatiana Trouboul, accompanies him to events, with their combined financial profile secured.

title: ‚ÄòJana Nayagan‚Äô postponed: Thalapathy Vijay film won‚Äôt release on January 9
content: Thalapathy Vijay's highly anticipated film 'Jana Nayagan' has been officially delayed due to certification issues with the CBFC. Distributors in Europe and Malaysia confirmed the cancellation of the January 9 release. The postponement comes amidst unprecedented advance booking demand and reports of black market ticket sales, highlighting industry-wide exhibition ecosystem weaknesses and revenue-sharing conflicts.

title: Watch: Helicopters & armed troops ‚Äî US boards two 'Ghost Fleet' tankers
content: The US Coast Guard successfully boarded two "ghost fleet" tankers, the Motor Tanker Bella I and Motor Tanker Sophia, in coordinated predawn operations. Both vessels had ties to Venezuela, with one attempting to evade pursuit for weeks. Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem vowed to disrupt narco-terrorism funding and protect Americans.

title: UP teen kidnapped, gang-raped by cop, his friend on railway track; dumped outside her home
content: A 14-year-old girl was allegedly kidnapped and gang-raped by a policeman and his friend in Kanpur. The perpetrators sexually abused her for two hours before abandoning her near her home. The family faced initial difficulties in filing a complaint due to one accused being a police officer.

title: US seizes Russia-flagged ship: Oil tanker linked to Venezuela; Moscow warship nearby
content: The US Coast Guard and military attempted to seize a Russian-flagged oil tanker linked to Venezuela after a lengthy pursuit, with Russian naval vessels nearby. This operation, targeting a vessel that evaded previous US boarding efforts, marks a significant escalation in enforcing sanctions against Venezuela, occurring shortly after a US raid in Caracas.

title: Sooryavanshi takes Player of the Match and Series; Ind U19 crush SA by 233 runs
content: Vaibhav Sooryavanshi and Aaron George starred with centuries as India U-19 thrashed South Africa by 233 runs to complete a 3-0 series whitewash. Sooryavanshi's 127 and George's 118 powered India to 393, a target South Africa couldn't chase, ending at 160. Sooryavanshi was named Player of the Match and Series.

title: Madras HC hearing: Judge reserves order after CBFC halts 'Jana Nayagan'; release fate unclear
content: Thalapathy Vijay's 'Jana Nayagan' faces a potential delay as the Madras High Court hears a censor row. The CBFC's decision to halt certification for a fresh review, despite earlier clearance indications, has put the Rs 500 crore film's January 9 release in jeopardy. The court questioned the board's transparency and sudden reversal, with a verdict expected on release day.

title: Got 'free advice' during Op Sindoor: EAM targets West's hypocrisy; what he said on Venezuela
content: External affairs minister S Jaishankar criticised western nations for offering unsolicited advice urging them to "look at their own region for levels of violence". He emphasised India's independent approach to international relations, dealing with partners and adversaries differently. Jaishankar also highlighted India's concern for safety of the people of Venezuela amidst crisis.

title: 'Russia, China only fear ...': Trump blasts Nato; takes credit for pushing bloc to pay 'bills'
content: US President Donald Trump asserted that NATO allies significantly boosted defense spending only after his direct intervention, claiming they now contribute more and that Russia and China wouldn't fear the alliance without U.S. backing. He also stated his actions prevented Russia from taking all of Ukraine and ended numerous conflicts, saving millions of lives.

title: Not Gill! Australian great picks this India player as next Test superstar
content: Cricket's next generation is stepping into the spotlight as legends near retirement.  Australian great Mark Waugh has tipped Indian prodigy Yashasvi Jaiswal as the future Test superstar, citing his impressive early career stats.  Meanwhile, former England captain Michael Vaughan champions England's Harry Brook for the same honour, highlighting his exciting potential. Both experts agree the game's future is bright.

title: B'desh to resume flights to Pak after 10-yr gap; has India given clearance?
content: Biman Bangladesh Airlines is set to resume direct flights between Dhaka and Karachi on January 29, ending a decade-long hiatus. Initially operating twice weekly, the service aims to boost travel and business ties. This development follows improving diplomatic relations between Bangladesh and Pakistan, though overflight permission from India remains unconfirmed.

title: Forever layoff: A rising trend turning workplaces into waiting rooms
content: Forever layoff captures a quiet shift in modern work: Layoffs that never end, only repeat. Through Dickens‚Äôs fact-driven Coketown and Kafka‚Äôs unfinished trial, this analysis traces how endless uncertainty reshapes mindspace, productivity, trust, and power at work. Jobs remain, but assurance disappears. Careers no longer progress or conclude. They linger, alert, provisional, and permanently under review.

title: Did Vicky Kaushal name his son after his character in 'Uri: The Surgical Strike'?
content: Vicky Kaushal and Katrina Kaif have revealed their son's name, Vihaan Kaushal, two months after his birth on November 7, 2025. Fans speculate the name is a nod to Vicky's character in 'Uri: The Surgical Strike'. The couple shared the news on Instagram, calling their son their 'Ray of Light'.

title: Fast break: Time to take advantage of Joel Embiid's hot streak?
content: Joel Embiid's recent hot stretch of games creates a golden opportunity for fantasy managers, plus other fantasy insights from Eric Moody in his look around the NBA.

title: US Says To Dictate Venezuela Decisions And Oil Sales
content: US President Donald Trump's administration said Wednesday it intends to dictate the decisions of Venezuela's interim leaders and control the country's oil sales "indefinitely" after toppling Nicolas Maduro.

title: White House Says Greenland Critical To Counter Russia, China In Arctic
content: The White House on Wednesday said the possible acquisition of Greenland remains under active discussion, framing the Arctic territory as strategically vital to US national security and to deterring the activities of Russia and China.

title: "Dangerous Times": Trump Proposes Massive $1.5 Trillion Defence Budget
content: President Donald Trump on Wednesday proposed setting military spending at $1.5 trillion in 2027, citing "troubled and dangerous times."

title: What Are The Charges Against Venezuela's Nicolas Maduro?
content: Nicolas Maduro, the president of Venezuela captured in a U.S. military raid, faces criminal charges in Manhattan, where federal prosecutors have targeted him for years.

title: Trump Says He Wants To Ban Large Investors From  Buying Houses
content: President Donald Trump said Wednesday that he wants to block large institutional investors from buying houses, saying that a ban would make it easier for younger families to buy their first homes.

title: India, Europe Can Stabilise Global Economy: S Jaishankar In France
content: India is strengthening its relationship with Europe and both sides can bring more stability into the international economy and global politics, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar said on Wednesday.

title: Bangladesh Interested In Procuring JF-17 Jets Developed With China: Pakistan
content: Pakistan and Bangladesh air chiefs held talks on "potential procurement" of JF-Thunder fighter jets by Dhaka as a mark of deepening defence ties between the two countries, the Pakistani military has said.

title: PM Modi To Address Rally At Abandoned Tata Nano Site In Bengal's Singur
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is likely to address a public gathering in Singur, Hooghly district, on January 18, during his planned two-day visit to West Bengal.

title: "India's Reform Express": PM Modi On 7.4% GDP Growth Estimate
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Wednesday referred to estimates of India's Real GDP growing by 7.4% in 2025-26 and said that "India's Reform Express" continues to gain momentum, powered by the NDA Government's comprehensive investment push.

title: Cabinet Panel Proposes Presenting Budget On Sunday, February 1
content: The Cabinet Committee on Political Affairs (CCPA) has agreed to propose January 28 as the date for the start of the budget session of Parliament and February 1 as the date for the presentation of the Union Budget.

title: "DMK Long-Term Ally": Congress MP Manickam Tagore On Tamil Nadu Polls
content: With the 2026 Tamil Nadu Assembly elections drawing closer, Congress MP Manickam Tagore sought to dispel speculation about any rift within the INDIA bloc in the state, asserting that the Congress and the DMK remain firmly aligned.

title: 2 Dead After Fire Breaks Out At Commercial Building In Mumbai
content: Two persons died after a fire broke out in a four-storey commercial building in Mumbai's Chandivali area on Wednesday evening, civic officials said.

title: 'Dont Take Us For Granted': Court To Railways In Delhi Stampede Case
content: The Delhi High Court told the Indian Railways not to take it for granted as it expressed its displeasure over the national transporter's failure to file an affidavit in a matter related to last year's stampede at the New Delhi railway station

title: Top US Official Sergio Gor To Arrive In India This Week Amid Trade Talks
content: US ambassador-designate Sergio Gor, known to be a key member of President Donald Trump's inner circle, is set to arrive in India in the next few days amid an estrangement in ties between the two countries.

title: "New World Disorder": Shashi Tharoor On US Capture Of Maduro
content: Congress MP Shashi Tharoor on Wednesday raised concerns about the recent US capture of the Venezuelan president, Nicolas Maduro, and said that the "law of the jungle of might is right" appears to be taking over.

title: 6.5 Crore Voters Removed From SIR Draft Lists Of 12 States
content: The names of 6.5 crore electors were removed from the draft electoral rolls of nine states and three Union territories published in the past days as part of the ongoing Special Intensive Revision (SIR) being carried out by the Election Commission.

title: IndiGo Gets 1st Airbus A321XLR Aircraft, To Be Deployed For Athens Flights
content: Domestic carrier IndiGo on Wednesday received its first Airbus A321 XLR aircraft at the Delhi airport, and will be deployed for non-stop services to Athens from Delhi and Mumbai starting later this month.

title: "We Are Restricted Boys Of School": Gurugram Students Perform Car Stunt
content: Police here on Wednesday filed an FIR in connection with a video on social media showing three boys hanging out of the windows of a moving car as the driver spins it around in circles, an officer said.

title: US, Denmark To Discuss Greenland Next Week, Says Marco Rubio
content: The United States Secretary of State Marco Rubio has said thathe will meet with the Denmark government to discuss Greenland next week.

title: Japan Nuclear Agency Official Loses Phone With Sensitive Information In China
content: An employee of Japan's nuclear regulator lost his phone containing highly sensitive information in China while on a personal trip in November. The phone had the name and contact details of staff in charge of nuclear security.

title: NFL futures: Seahawks enter playoffs as Super Bowl favorites, Rams right behind
content: The top two teams in the NFC West have the best odds to win the Super Bowl heading into the playoffs. The  Seattle Seahawks  are the favorites to win Super Bowl 60, following closely by the division rival  Los Angeles Rams . The AFC West-winning  Denver Broncos  have the third-best odds to win the Super Bowl as the top overall seed in the AFC. They, like the Seahawks, will have a bye in the first round. Here are the Super Bowl odds and conference championship odds for every team still in the hunt. Note: Odds by  DraftKings Sportsbook  and subject to change.

title: Max Americana: US seizes Russian-flagged oil tanker in Europe; turns up heat on Greenland
content: the u.s. navy seized a Russian-flagged tanker carrying oil from venezuela . the tanker violated US sanctions, getting to it ahead of Russian defence . a bellicose statement from the president dismissed global alarm about US action in Venezuela .

title: 'This is one of the big moments in college football': Demond Williams Jr.'s case tests whether contracts can be enforced
content: demond Williams Jr. signed a contract to return to the u.s. four days earlier . he'd signed the contract, which was set to pay him in the mid-$4 million range . "this is a very bright line," a college official says .

title: College football transfer portal: Tracking who's on the move
content: Max Olson ranks Cincinnati's Brendan Sorsby as the top player in the transfer portal and predicts a recruitment battle between Texas Tech and LSU. (1:04) College football's transfer portal officially opened at midnight ET on Jan. 2. However, players have been announcing their intentions to transfer since the regular season ended. By midday on Day 1, more than 4,500 Division I college football players have entered the transfer portal. Players now have until Jan. 16 to enter their name to transfer. It doesn't mean they have to find their new schools by then -- or that they can't return to their previous schools. We are tracking the notable players entering the portal as well as those players who will re-sign with their current schools. Here's the latest news and updates on how the 2026 season could be transformed.

title: 'Each year was a step': Is Jordan Love on the same SB path as Favre, Rodgers?
content: the Packers lost 16-3 to the Vikings to end the regular season . Brett Favre won his lone Super Bowl at age 27 and in his sixth season in his NFL career . the Packers drafted Love no. 26 in 2020 .

title: Offseason grades: Cubs add rotation upside in trade for Edward Cabrera
content: the 2025-26 offseason is officially here, and we have you covered with grades and analysis for every major signing and trade this winter . if it's a big-money free agent signing that changes the course of your team's future, we'll weigh in with what it all means for next season and beyond .

title: 2026 Unrivaled megapreview: Rosters, rankings, rules, how to watch
content: 54 of the league's top players are in Miami as the second season of unrivaled tips off . the 3-on-3 league was created to give players a domestic offseason playing opportunity . each member of this season's championship team will win an additional $100,000 .

title: Early wild card bets: How to bet Packers-Bears, Bills-Jaguars
content: the playoffs kick off with the Los Angeles Rams at the Carolina Panthers, followed by the Green Bay Packers at Chicago Bears . on Sunday, the red-hot Houston Texans hit the road to face the Pittsburgh Steelers .

title: Wait, the Ravens moved on from Harbaugh?! Answering seven questions about the move
content: the Baltimore Ravens are looking for a new head coach after the move . owner Steve Bisciotti said he was searching for the next coach . the manager was fired after guiding the Ravens to a Super Bowl title in 2012 .

title: Standouts and biggest surprises (both good and bad) from the 2026 World Juniors
content: the number of teams capable of winning a medal has expanded . the talent is there, but perhaps nations with an embarrassment of riches get a little too cute with their approach . but the fact that Czechia, Sweden and Finland are right there with Canada and the United States speaks to the growth of hockey .

title: EA 26 reveals men's, women's Team of the Year nominees
content: the campaign is underway to crown the EA Sports FC 26 Team of the Year . the winners will be announced on the official website, in-game and for the first time across social media platforms . there are a handful of familiar candidates nominated with seasoned veterans alisson Becker (Liverpool), Gianluigi Donnarumma (Man City), Manuel Neuer (Bayern Munich), Thibaut Courtois (Real M) .

title: Govt approves Rs 1,800 cr for new high-security printing line for banknotes, passports
content: the govt has approved a proposal for setting up a new cylindrical mould watermark banknote line with an annual capacity to produce 6,000 tonnes of high-security paper . the new line ‚Äî a set of machines ‚Äî will replace two of the three lines at the security paper mill, Narmadapuram in Madhya Pradesh .

title: Why these semifinals are just what college football needed
content: new bloods will replace blue bloods on college football's biggest postseason stage . julian zelizer: it's a basketball school that is leading the movement . she says if the Hurricanes win a national championship, they'll be able to win .

title: One big thing we're hearing on every NFL team's coaching situation: Hot seats, candidates, more
content: the Raiders are in position to hunt for a big-name defensive coordinator after firing Matt Eberflus . we're also keeping an eye on coach movement . how did the coach split go down? what are the coaches thinking after securing the no. 1 pick .

title: Source: Bowles returning as Bucs' coach in '26
content: a source confirms that coach Todd Bowles is returning for the 2026 season . he met with the Glazer family, who own the Buccaneers . it should be noted that this meeting happened after news broke that the Baltimore Ravens had fired super bowl-winning coach John Harbaugh after 18 seasons .

title: NBA Power Rankings: Where Mavs, Hawks and others stack up ahead of trade deadline
content: there is less than one month until the 2026 trade deadline . the two teams are open to trade talks . it's yet to be seen how the trade deadline will impact the standings . both the Detroit Pistons and Oklahoma City Thunder stand firmly at the top of their conferences .

title: Ranking the 25 best freshmen from the college football season
content: the 2025 college football season is in the books and first-year players were a big part of it . toney is young enough to still be a high school senior . he has become one of the defining stars of Miami's resurgence .

title: Reranking Freshman of the Year contenders
content: the top 10 recruits in the 2025 SC Next 100 rankings were averaging 17.8 points in 2026 . most of those players will be found in our updated freshman rankings below . some of these players could hit the "freshman wall" with conference play in full swing .

title: TMC MP Abhishek Banerjee¬†slams¬†BJP over migrant workers‚Äô ordeal when detained in Maharashtra
content: The two workers detained over allegations of being Bangladeshi nationals were from¬†Balurghat¬†constituency, which is led by¬†BJP MP and Union Minister Sukanta Majumdar

title: Protests erupt outside Bengal‚Äôs health department as ASHA workers demand pay hike, benefits
content: The demands include increased monthly honorarium, life insurance benefits, maternity leave, recognition as permanent government employees among others

title: Radha Nagar subway in Chromepet finally opened
content: The¬†facility was planned way back in¬†2006,¬†and the foundation stone too was laid,¬†as a pedestrian-only facility¬†to¬†enable residents of East¬†Chromepet¬†to access the  Grand Southern Trunk (GST) Road

title: Bihar Govt. spent over ‚Çπ3,630 crore on development schemes under MMKVY in five years: Minister
content: Corpus of Mukhya Mantri Kshetra Vikas Yojana increased from ‚Çπ3 crore to ‚Çπ4 crore; 1108 of 2456 schemes have been completed till November 2025

title: Chennai Corporation to reassess women‚Äôs safety perceptions in city‚Äôs public spaces and transport
content: The upcoming midline study would adopt a mixed-method approach and will be conducted across all 15 zones of Chennai and major transit points

title: CM Nitish orders Bihar officials to hear public grievances at their offices two days a week
content: The CM asserted that a register of complaints received from visitors will be maintained, instructions have been given to all concerned officials to make this arrangement effective from January 19

title: SASTRA University, The Hindu Education Plus to organise webinar on research and innovation
content: The session would offer students insights into research-oriented career options, interdisciplinary innovation, and national science initiatives

title: Vedanta chairperson Anil Agarwal's son Agnivesh dies in U.S. at 49
content: The Board member of a Vedanta group firm got injured in a skiing accident and was recovering when he died of a cardiac arrest

title: Jharkhand to debut at World Economic Forum to be held in Davos
content: Chief Minister Hemant Soren will lead the 11-member delegation from January 18 to 26; visit coincides with 25 years of Jharkhand‚Äôs statehood

title: Maharashtra Congress vice-president dies of stab wounds in Akola
content: Main accused held, IPS officer to head probe, say police; Hidayatullah Patel was stabbed at a mosque in Akola district

title: ‚ÄòDivine connect‚Äô through Money Order prevails over digital currency
content: Launched in 2009, ‚ÄòAseervachanam‚Äô scheme is still popular in the era of UPI transactions as the TTD received ‚Çπ3.1 crore as donations through M.O. from 1.26 lakh devotees in 2025

title: Rogue elephant kills 13 in two days in Jharkhand villages
content: Teams of forest officials with experts from West Bengal's Bankura district have been engaged to drive away the elephant back to the forest

title: For-profit companies allowed to set up medical colleges under PPP mode, says NMC chief
content: As hospitals run under PPP mode will be under the purview of State governments,  patients will get treatment on either free or subsidised basis, says Abhijat Chandrakant Sheth

title: Chief Minister Naidu seeks statutory protection for Amaravati as Andhra Pradesh‚Äôs capital
content: Seeking introduction of the relevant Bill in Parliament, he tells Amit Shah that it is crucial for the State‚Äôs development and stability

title: Alienation in Kashmir touches unprecedented level, Omar prefers silence: Mehbooba Mufti
content: Mufti accused the current dispensation in J&K under Omar Abdullh of failing to address the burning issues of people

title: NCB seized 1.33 lakh kg of drugs worth about ‚Çπ2,000 crore in 2025
content: During the year, the agency also busted six drug laboratories operating in Rajasthan, Maharashtra, West Bengal, and Madhya Pradesh

title: A.P. govt. opens ‚Äònet-zero‚Äô residential school at Kuntamukkala near Vijayawada
content: The pilot project aims to serve as a scalable model of an Integrated Ecological Campus which will include green belts, rainforest, wetlands, and microgreens

title: Man electrocuted on illegal electrical fence near Arakkonam; farmer held
content: Police said that the farmer had reportedly erected illegal electrical fencing around the farmland to prevent wild animals from damaging crops during night

title: Vijay‚Äôs ‚ÄòJana Nayagan‚Äô postponed; new release date to be announced soon
content: Earlier in the day, the Madras HC had reserved orders on a writ petition filed by the film‚Äôs producer against the non-issuance of the censor certificate by the Central Board of Film Certification

title: Farmers seek release of water from Sathanur dam in Tiruvannamalai on January 14 for irrigation
content: While water from the dam‚Äôs Left Bank Canal feeds 30 tanks in Tiruvannamalai and 10 in Villupuram, the Right Bank Canal is connected to 48 tanks in Villupuram

title: AICC observers for poll-bound States
content: D.K. Shivakumar, Bhupesh Baghel and Bandhu Tirkey have been appointed for Assam; Sachin Pilot, Kanhaiya Kumar, Imran Pratapgarhi, K.J. George are observers for Kerala

title: Elections to five standing committees in Thiruvananthapuram Corporation postponed
content: Only the welfare, town planning and tax appeal standing committees were formed in the elections held on Wednesday.  Tactical deployment of councillors to capture control of certain standing committees led to a lack of quorum in others. BJP manages majority in town planning standing committee, despite R.Sreelekha‚Äôs vote becoming invalid due to her failure in noting her name and signature on  ballot paper

title: Assam BJP leader¬†Kabindra Purkayastha dies at 94
content: The former Union Minister laid the foundation of the party in the northeast and was one of the key drivers of its growth in Assam, Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma says

title: Tamil Nadu Government orders probe into ED‚Äôs corruption allegations linking Minister K.N. Nehru
content: The DVAC has launched a detailed inquiry into the alleged bribery in the award of contracts in MAWS department

title: Central drug regulator releases guidelines to compound minor drug violations
content: The move will aid business compliance, exempting pharma firms from appearing in court in case of ‚Äúcertain minor contraventions‚Äù; instead, they will have to pay a fine and take ‚Äúself-corrective actions‚Äù

title: Supreme Court defers Sonam Wangchuk detention case hearing by a day
content: The move will enable Justice P.B.¬†Varale¬†to read the case records of a challenge launched by Dr. Gitanjali J. Angmo against the Centre for detaining her husband and climate activist Sonam Wangchuk under the National Security Act.¬†

title: Centre moves to restore popular govt. in Manipur, holds review meets
content: Government conducts two security meetings in a week, discusses ‚Äúpros and cons‚Äù of extending President‚Äôs Rule, and security deployment in Manipur; Kuki-Zo groups opposed to government formation, remain firm on demand for separate administration

title: Public protests, scarcity of land hampering setting up of dog shelters, says Kerala govt.
content: The Revenue and Local Self-Government departments are in the process of identifying suitable land for new shelters. Once the land is finalised, the Animal Husbandry department will provide technical support for setting up the facilities

title: Minister raps BIAL over Bengaluru airport‚Äôs pick-up, parking regulations
content: During the inspection, the Minister also noticed that a portion of the bus bays earmarked for Bengaluru Metropolitan Transport Corporation (BMTC) Vayu Vajra airport buses had been taken over, triggering sharp criticism from him

title: Simple language in stories a conscious decision to reach more people: Banu Mushtaq
content: Interestingly, the Booker prize winner dictates poems and short stories to a voice-to-text software in her phone, often when she is travelling, as her work as a lawyer and an activist leaves her little time to sit down and put pen to paper

title: Congress to place legal teams in every district; they will be our eyes and ears: Singhvi
content: The Congress will also constitute a ‚ÄòRapid response force‚Äô of leading lawyers in each State. These teams will be tasked with promptly taking court cases involving the party

title: Centre seeks public comments on draft Pesticides Management Bill to replace 1968 Act
content: The legislation aims to replace the 57-year-old Insecticides Act, 1968, and the Insecticides Rules, 1971, with enhanced penalties for violations.

title: Ernakulam Rural police register 3,908¬†NDPS¬†cases; 4,138 arrested
content: 603 kg of suspected ganja, more than double the quantity in 2024, and 1.4 kg of suspected¬†MDMA¬†were seized;¬†seven people were jailed under the¬†PITNDPS¬†Act

title: State govt. shares High Court‚Äôs satisfaction with SIT probe, says Vasavan
content: On the SIT quizzing former Devaswom Minister Kadakampally Surendran, the Devaswom Minister said the SIT was free to summon or question anyone as part its probe

title: X tells IT Ministry it is ‚Äòin compliance‚Äô with Indian law
content: The social media platform has been scrutinised by the government after its Grok chatbot publicly generated non-consensual sexualised pictures of women

title: Writers cannot stay neutral in times of intolerance, says Kerala Chief Minister
content: Pinarayi and V.D. Satheesan voice their opposition to U.S. attack on Venezuela at the inaugural function of the Kerala Legislature International Book Festival. Legislative Assembly‚Äôs award for contributions to literature handed over to writer N.S. Madhavan

title: Over 50 posts vacant in PCB, says report
content: Of the total vacant seats, 19 are in the scientific category; 11 in the engineering wing; and 23 in the administration section

title: Nation must emulate Malappuram‚Äôs communal harmony, says Kanthapuram
content: Anyone who has visited the district even once will understand the reality: the warmth and spirit of coexistence of its people,‚Äù he says, urging society to salute and adopt the positive examples of the district rather than disparage its people

title: Arrangements in place for Flamingo Festival in Tirupati
content: The event is set to be held at Pulicat Bird Sanctuary in Sullurpeta constituency on January 10 and 11

title: Form special cell to deal with black magic, HC tells govt.
